author: dudacambraia
title: Temporal em SP: em Santos, rajadas de vento atingem 134 km/h, segundo Defesa Civil
text:
Temporal em SP: em Santos, rajadas de vento atingem 134 km/h, segundo Defesa Civil
Cidades do litoral registraram chuva forte, ventania e quedas de √°rvores
Na noite desta quinta-feira (21), parte do estado de S√£o Paulo foi atingido por uma forte chuva com ventania. Em Santos, no litoral, os ventos chegaram a 134,5 km/h, √†s 19h40, como foi divulgado pela Defesa Civil estadual.
Segundo a Defesa Civil municipal, foram registrados 17 quedas de √°rvores no munic√≠pio. Na Pra√ßa Miguel Couto, uma √°rvore atingiu um ve√≠culo que estava estacionado no local. Os bairros mais afetados foram Vila Mathias, Marap√© e Embar√©.
Em Peru√≠be, 25 √°rvores ca√≠ram na cidade, parte delas na Rodovia Coronel Rodolpho Petten√°. Em Bertioga, √°rvores ca√≠ram na Rodovia Rio Santos e Mogi Bertioga. Em Ilhabela, al√©m de registros de queda de √°rvores, a Defesa Civil tamb√©m registrou pontos de alagamento.
Em S√£o Sebasti√£o, segundo a Defesa Civil municipal, algumas √°rvores atingiram resid√™ncias e, at√© o momento, n√£o houve registro de pessoas feridas, desalojadas ou desabrigadas.
J√° em Lins, duas resid√™ncias registraram destelhamento, sendo uma parcialmente e outra totalmente, resultando em duas pessoas desalojadas, encaminhadas para a casa de familiares. Na Estrada Lins, KM 05, ocorreu o deslizamento de um barranco, interditando a via parcialmente.
A rua Afonso Pena, em Lins, ficou totalmente alagada, atingindo algumas casas, mas a √°gua escoou rapidamente. Um carro com dois ocupantes caiu no c√≥rrego Barbosinha, as v√≠timas foram socorridas pelo Corpo de Bombeiros e encaminhadas para o Pronto Socorro da Santa Casa.
Em Monguagu√°, foi constatado oito quedas de √°rvores em via p√∫blica e tr√™s quedas de poste de energia, que provocou interrup√ß√£o no fornecimento de energia nos bairros Florida, Agenor, Itagua√≠, Jussara e Vera Cruz. Houve tamb√©m registro de destelhamento de uma resid√™ncia, que foi totalmente interditada e os sete moradores foram alojados na casa de parentes.
A cidade de Cubat√£o tamb√©m registrou quedas de √°rvores e interrup√ß√£o no fornecimento de energia el√©trica nos bairros Vila Paulista, Centro e Vila Natal, que j√° foi restabelecida na manh√£ de sexta-feira (22). No Guaruj√°, foi registrado 17 quedas de √°rvores em via p√∫blica e sobre fia√ß√£o el√©trica, que provocou interrup√ß√£o no fornecimento de energia em alguns bairros.
O maior acumulado de chuva foi registrado na cidade de Jambeiro, com 89 mil√≠metros. Mogi Gua√ßu, Praia Grande, Ilhabela, Casa Branca, S√£o Sebasti√£o, Itapira e Mongagu√° tamb√©m registraram acumulados acima de 60 mil√≠metros.
Sexta-feira (22):
Nesta sexta-feira (22), por volta das 11h35, a Defesa Civil de S√£o Paulo registrou chuva se espalhando pela regi√£o de Franca e atingindo √°reas pr√≥ximas, com ventos e raios. √Äs 11h41, foi registrado precipita√ß√£o na regi√£o de S√£o Jo√£o da Boa Vista. √Äs 12h01, o √≥rg√£o relatou chuva persistente na regi√£o de S√£o Sebasti√£o, Caraguatatuba e Ubatuba.

author: Juan Camilo Rodr√≠guez Parrado
title: Independiente Santa Fe perder√≠a a su ‚Äòle√≥n‚Äô a manos de uno de los grandes del continente - Infobae
text:
Agust√≠n Rodr√≠guez es el actual goleador de Independiente Santa Fe - cr√©dito AFP Independiente Santa Fe es uno de los l√≠deres del f√∫tbol colombiano. Tras ser subcampe√≥n en el primer semestre, el conjunto cardenal ha mantenido su buen rendimiento y se ubica segundo en la tabla de posiciones con seis unidades, solo por detr√°s de Atl√©tico Nacional, que suma nueve puntos, pero ha jugado un partido m√°s.
No obstante, los √°nimos en las toldas cardenales no ser√≠an los mejores a pesar de haber ganado sus dos primeros partidos en el campeonato. La hinchada ha manifestado su malestar por el incremento en el precio de los abonos, as√≠ como por la salida de jugadores como Francisco Chaverra y Jersson Gonz√°lez, quienes fueron vitales en la destacada campa√±a del conjunto cardenal en la primera parte del a√±o.
Ahora puede seguirnos en nuestro WhatsApp Channel y en Facebook .
Adem√°s de las bajas de los futbolistas que partieron a Deportivo Independiente Medell√≠n, el conjunto cardenal podr√≠a sufrir la salida de uno de los delanteros que tambi√©n brill√≥ en el primer semestre y que se posiciona como una de las figuras en el torneo actual.
El club bogotano aspira mejorar su participaci√≥n en el segundo semestre del presente a√±o - cr√©dito @SantaFe/X Se trata del uruguayo Agust√≠n Rodr√≠guez, que marc√≥ el penal que dio el empate parcial en la serie contra Atl√©tico Bucaramanga y que celebr√≥ ense√±ando un tatuaje de un le√≥n que est√° inmortalizado en toda su espalda . El atacante charr√∫a se ha ganado el coraz√≥n de la hinchada cardenal a pesar de haber errado el disparo definitivo en la tanda de penales contra el conjunto santandereano. Sin embargo, uno de los equipos m√°s importantes de su pa√≠s de origen, que adem√°s es uno de los m√°s grandes del continente, tendr√≠a serias intenciones de contar con sus servicios en los pr√≥ximos meses.
Seg√∫n se viraliz√≥ en redes sociales, Nacional de Montevideo, club que cuenta en su palmar√©s con tres Copas Libertadores, tres Copas Intercontinentales, dos Copas Interamericanas y una Recopa Sudamericana, estar√≠a en la b√∫squeda de un delantero y Rodr√≠guez estar√≠a dentro de la baraja de candidatos.
Agust√≠n Rodr√≠guez registra siete goles con la camiseta cardenal - cr√©dito Independiente Santa Fe Desde que lleg√≥ al cuadro cardenal, el Le√≥n ha anotado siete goles, dos en la presente campa√±a, en la que marc√≥ frente a Deportivo Pasto en la primera jornada, as√≠ como contra Envigado en la segunda jornada.
Qu√© otras salidas se podr√≠an registrar en Independiente Santa Fe En medio de una entrevista con RCN Radio, el presidente Eduardo M√©ndez coment√≥ que ning√∫n otro futbolista del cuadro cardenal saldr√° del club en condici√≥n pr√©stamo; la √∫nica opci√≥n para una salida es que un equipo proponga la compra de uno de los futbolistas. De hecho, M√©ndez indic√≥ que en la ma√±ana del martes 16 de julio de 2024 hubo quienes preguntaron condiciones por Jhojan Torres, volante del club santafere√±o que surgi√≥ de la cantera, pero que no dieron a conocer ninguna oferta.
Por otra parte, el presidente cardenal dej√≥ la puerta abierta para que lleguen dos o tres futbolistas m√°s al plantel santafere√±o, de cara al segundo semestre del presente a√±o. Sin embargo, M√©ndez descart√≥ la posibilidad de que llegue alg√∫n fichaje ‚Äúbomba‚Äù, como hab√≠a trascendido en redes sociales semanas atr√°s.
Eduardo M√©ndez, presidente de Santa Fe, asegur√≥ que si sale alg√∫n otro futbolista de club ser√° por compra, no por pr√©stamo - cr√©dito Independiente Santa Fe Cu√°ndo ser√° el pr√≥ximo partido de Independiente Santa Fe en la Liga Betplay II Independiente Santa Fe disputar√° la tercera fecha de la Liga Betplay II el pr√≥ximo s√°bado 27 de julio, cuando se mida con La Equidad en El Camp√≠n, desde las 6:00 p. m., en lo que ser√≠a el tercer cap√≠tulo de un nuevo recorrido hacia el t√≠tulo del f√∫tbol colombiano.
De ganar, el conjunto bogotano se posicionar√≠a en la cima del campeonato junto con Atl√©tico Nacional con nueve puntos en tres partidos disputados.

author: Reuters
title: China's push for greener aluminium hit by erratic rains, power cuts By Reuters
text: BEIJING (Reuters) - Erratic rainfall in China's southwest is frustrating a multibillion-dollar push to green an aluminium industry that accounts for almost 60% of global output and, by some estimates, emits more carbon dioxide than Australia. Lured by official promises of cheap hydropower, China Hongqiao Group and a handful of other coal-reliant smelters several years ago began moving 6.56 million metric tons of capacity - about 15% of China's total - from the northern rust belt to the mountainous and ethnically diverse Yunnan province, known for tea, coffee and wild mushrooms. The opportunity to cut electricity bills and help the world's top polluter tackle global warming seemed like a safe bet. But as Yunnan's rivers and reservoirs dwindled amid poor rainfall, which some experts attribute to climate change, so did the reliability of electricity. Reuters interviews with almost two dozen industry figures and analysts, as well as company filings and official documents, found insufficient hydropower has meant that only a little over half of the planned aluminium capacity shift has materialised. Some smelters are slowing or scaling back their already-delayed plans and others are seeking alternative locations. "The power cuts in the past two years have made it clear that Yunnan can't be sustained as a major producing region," said one Yunnan industry figure who, as with others, spoke on the condition of anonymity due to the issue's sensitivity. Despite growing demand for low-carbon products and strong industry profits in recent years, eight employees at four Yunnan smelters said they have had to cut production by 10% to 40%. Muyi Yang, an adjunct fellow at the University of Technology Sydney who researches energy policy, said any supply disruptions would delay China's broader energy transition because aluminium is used in many clean technologies. In addition to hindering China's climate goals, the hydro crunch has caused volatility in global aluminium prices and imperilled the potential for producers to cash in on demand for "green" metal, according to the analysts and industry sources. Hongqiao's plan to move almost 4 million tons of production from Shandong province to Yunnan involved building two plants near the Vietnam border, in Wenshan and Honghe prefectures, each with capacity of roughly 2 million tons. The 17 billion yuan ($2.35 billion) Wenshan factory opened in 2020 and was intended to reach full capacity in August 2022, the director of the industrial park where it is located told state media in 2021. But unstable hydropower has prevented that, two industry figures said. At Honghe, production was due to begin in March 2023, according to a December 2021 overview of projects published by the Yunnan Department of Industry and Information Technology. Yet, initial production capacity of just 500,000 tons will be ready in the middle of this year, according to a person familiar with the matter. Chen Xinlin, a senior metals and mining consultant at Wood Mackenzie, said Honghe's capacity may not be commissioned this year due to the "hydropower bottleneck". Hongqiao and its parent, Shandong Weiqiao Pioneering Group, did not respond to Reuters questions about the matter, and the Yunnan government declined to comment. China's environment and industry ministries, and the top planning agency, the National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC), did not respond to requests for comment. GREEN DREAMS Aluminium accounts for about 3% of the world's direct industrial carbon dioxide, according to the International Energy Agency. For China, that meant cleaning up the sector would be crucial to its goals, formalised in 2020, of ensuring the country's carbon emissions peak by the end of this decade and reach net zero by 2060. Part of the allure of aluminium made from hydropower or other clean energy is that producers may be able to charge premiums as global manufacturers raise their carbon standards for materials, though only a tiny proportion of green aluminium currently attracts such a premium. Besides Hongqiao, producers including industry leader Aluminium Corporation of China, known as Chinalco, were drawn to Yunnan by provincial authorities' offer of discounted greener power at 0.25 yuan per kilowatt hour (kWh), less than half of what they were paying in northern China. Chinalco announced in 2018 that it would move 1.2 million tons to Yunnan, and suppliers including anode producer Sunstone Development followed. Neither responded to requests for comment. The new smelters brought in staff from China's north, with factory canteens serving braised noodles and shaobing, a flatbread stuffed with meat, to give workers a taste of home. The plants produce silver-coloured ingots cast from molten aluminium into square-shaped bundles. These are collected by trucks and delivered to factories for processing into goods such as car parts, window frames and beer cans. A 2022 World Economic Forum report anticipated that 2 to 3 million tons of primary aluminium production would move annually to China's southwest, mostly Yunnan, from 2020 to 2025, tapering to 90,000 to 100,000 tons per year by 2060. The pace has been much slower. Officials had been aware that power was a potential constraint. "Solving power supply issues is the first thing Wenshan needs to work on to develop a green aluminium industry," He Chun, deputy bureau chief of the Wenshan Energy Bureau, told state media in 2021. But rains proved uncooperative. Yunnan's Water Resources Department said in January that severe drought had persisted for a fifth year, leading to reduced hydropower generation. On April 16, Wenshan officials warned of extreme drought conditions in Yanshan county, where several aluminium plants are located, including a Hongqiao smelter. Average rainfall so far this year is down 37%, according to the Wenshan government. Adding to the smelters' dilemma, the NDRC in 2021 banned discounted power rates for aluminium producers. 'MAY THERE BE MORE RAIN' In interviews with Reuters, 10 of the industry figures at smelters that moved to Yunnan described higher-than-expected electricity rates and periodic orders from the energy provider, China Southern Power Grid, to shut down on short notice. Electricity rates had risen to 0.47 to 0.50 yuan per kWh, seven of these people said, still below what smelters paid in the north. China Southern did not respond to a faxed request for comment. Producers including Chinalco-owned Yunnan Aluminium and Henan Shenhuo Coal & Power, neither of which responded to requests for comment, have cited Yunnan's power-supply problems in financial filings. In its 2023 annual report, Shenhuo warned that further increases in electricity rates or supply disruptions would create uncertainty for its operations. Yunnan has sought to free up electricity by curbing transfers to other provinces. The provincial government has also said it will accelerate construction of wind and solar power, as well as more hydropower stations, and bolster its capacity for thermal power, which mainly comes from coal. But frustrated smelting-industry figures talk of looking elsewhere. "No one dares to stick with their relocation plan" because of Yunnan's power issues, said a manager at a Yunnan smelter. Analysts expect more capacity to shift to northwestern China, where there is more access to power, including from coal that can assure stable supply for smelters. In May 2023, Weiqiao's chairman Zhang Bo announced plans with Shandong Chuangxin Group to build a green aluminium base in Inner Mongolia, powered by wind and solar, according to a statement on the regional government's website. For now, Yunnan smelter operators are looking to the skies. "May there be more rain, that's the best thing we can wish for," said one smelter employee. ($1 = 7.2448 [Chinese yuan](/currencies/usd-cny) renminbi)

author: BetUS Locker Room Staff
title: Nigma Galaxy finish their roster
text:
Nigma Galaxy finish their roster
Fans of Nigma Galaxy are overjoyed that the team‚Äôs Dota 2 lineup for the 2024 season is complete. When Amer ‚ÄúMiracle-‚Äù Al-Barkawi returned last month, the organization showed its appreciation to the community and its supporters. Check out this information and more of our articles to help your
dota 2 betting adventures!
With the final 2 pieces of the puzzle now known, a full lineup is set, just in time for the DreamLeague Season 22 qualifiers and the BetBoom Dacha 2024. The team announced the addition of Daniel ‚ÄúGhost‚Äù Chan, a former player for Xtreme Gaming, and Roman ‚ÄúrmN-‚Äù Paley, a former coach of Nigma Galaxy, as their new offlaner and position four support, respectively.
Some rumors are more true than othersüåü
We complete our roster by welcoming
[@Ghostdota98]and [@rmN_dota]to the team! [pic.twitter.com/lUJXoHFP2P]
‚Äî Nigma Galaxy (@NigmaGalaxy)
[January 5, 2024]
The Malaysian gamer Ghost has served as a representative for several prestigious companies. He has represented formidable Chinese teams including Royal Never Give Up and Xtreme Gaming, his most recent squad. The 25-year-old is the primary carrier. However, Liquipedia states that Ghost will take over the offlane spot while Miracle-takes over the first slot. Ghost performed for RNG and attended The International 2022. However, the athlete hasn‚Äôt yet turned forth a standout performance. Maybe 2024, when he sets out on a fresh adventure in Nigma Galaxy with legendary veterans, will be his year. Interestingly, Ghost and Nigma Galaxy Sea played together in 2020, the year that Nigma Galaxy Sea claimed Top Clans. As he enters the European continent for the first time, his relocation to Nigma Galaxy signifies a new chapter in his life. The earlier reports that Ivan ‚ÄúPure‚Äù Moskalenko will be entering Nigma Galaxy have now been disproven with the addition of Ghost.
Over the past ten years, RmN- has been a competitive player in Dota 2. Since 2019 (even back when Team Liquid was still in existence), he has been the coach of Nigma Galaxy. Over the previous few years, he has also replaced a number of team members. However, he exits the coaching bubble in 2024 and resumes playing competitively. With Team Nigma, rmN-won the OGA Dota PIT Season 2: Europe/CIS 2020, demonstrating his stellar Dota 2 record. He is now a confirmed member of Nigma Galaxy‚Äôs Dota 2 squad. Although rmN-has been their coach for the last five years, so they do have some history together. However, their new offlaner is traveling outside of Southeast Asia for the first time and taking on a new position to cover for MinD_ContRoL, who left the team after 8 years.
The redesigned Nigma Galaxy is fascinating and strange at the same time. Nigma Galaxy have been struggling to rise to the top for the past four years, missing The International three times in a row. The team needed a fresh start, and this new group of players could be it.
Fans will get to watch the new Nigma Galaxy lineup in action when the BetBoom Dacha 2024 MENA (Middle East and North Africa) closed qualifier approaches. KuroKy and rmN-have previously demonstrated their synergy in competitions, and this fresh chance will let fans discover what else they have planned. It will be interesting to observe whether the squad plays around Miracle in the same way as in the past or if they have fresh tactics to deal with the opposition.
Dota 2‚Äôs competitive scene is full of excitement and
esports odds for you to take a look at! Don‚Äôt forget to check our content for more information and bet on esports at BetUS Sportsbook & Casino.

author: Ryan Shiner
title: Jefferson City man charged after allegedly threatening to pull gun on business owner - ABC17NEWS
text:
Jefferson City man charged after allegedly threatening to pull gun on business owner
COLUMBIA, Mo. (KMIZ)
A Jefferson City man was charged with a felony and a misdemeanor after he allegedly threatened to pull a gun on a business owner following an argument involving a purse on Tuesday.
Christian Chenet, 28, was charged on Wednesday with first-degree harassment and fourth-degree assault, a misdemeanor. He is being held at the Cole County Jail without bond. An arraignment was held Wednesday afternoon.
The probable cause statement says that police were called to a business around 2:40 p.m. at 128 East High Street for a weapons offense. The victim in the case is the owner of the business, who claimed Chenet came to pick up a purse that was left by Chenet‚Äôs boss, the statement says.
The victim opened the purse to identify the owner and Chenet allegedly became angry, but the victim claimed he felt obligated to give the purse directly to the owner, the statement says. Chenet allegedly called the victim a racist and then threatened to grab a gun from his car, the statement says.
A witness also heard Chenet say something about grabbing a gun, court documents say. Chenet was arrested and police found a gun in his vehicle, the statement says. Chenet allegedly told police that he was pushed by the victim and claimed he mentioned shooting the victim while he was on the phone with dispatcher, the statement says.
Chenet defended his actions to police, court documents say. The victim and witness told police that no one pushed Chenet, court documents say.

author: Fernanda Bass√¥a
title: N√≠veis dos rios Sinos e Ca√≠ come√ßam a baixar e trazem novas perspectivas para as comunidades atingidas
text: N√≠veis dos rios Sinos e Ca√≠ come√ßam a baixar e trazem novas perspectivas para as comunidades atingidas Chuva da madrugada n√£o alterou o comportamento dos rios publicidade A pancada de chuva que caiu em algumas cidades da Regi√£o Metropolitana e no Vale do Sinos na madrugada deste domingo n√£o foi suficiente para afetar de forma significativa os n√≠veis dos rios e arroios, que estabilizaram durante o final de semana e entraram em leve decl√≠nio. Em S√£o Leopoldo, o n√≠vel do Rio dos Sinos neste domingo aferiu a marca de 5,08m apresentando leve redu√ß√£o. A cidade n√£o registrou transtornos por conta da chuva. Em Novo Hamburgo, depois de bater os 6,70m no s√°bado, o Rio dos Sinos come√ßou a baixar e neste domingo chegou a 6,60m, com redu√ß√£o gradual. Em Sapiranga, o acumulado de chuva em oito dias foi de 188mm e 17 pessoas est√£o abrigadas no gin√°sio da Escola Doutor D√©cio Gomes Pereira. Outras 164 est√£o acolhidas na casa de familiares ou parentes. Em Sapucaia do Sul, de forma semelhante, o n√≠vel do Sinos marca 5,07m, tamb√©m em decl√≠nio. Na sexta-feira o prefeito Volmir Rodrigues ativou o plano de conting√™ncia do Munic√≠pio devido √†s chuvas recentes que resultou em transtornos pontuais nos bairros pr√≥ximos ao Rio dos Sinos. De acordo com o prefeito, o objetivo principal √© estar estrategicamente preparado para lidar com poss√≠veis adversidades decorrentes da nova cheia do Rio dos Sinos, mesmo que em menor escala. O gin√°sio da Escola Otaviano Silveira j√° est√° aberto e foi colocado √† disposi√ß√£o da comunidade, caso haja necessidade de acolhimento de pessoas. ‚Äú√â importante ressaltar que, dessa vez, o Rio dos Sinos n√£o ir√° atingir nem de perto o n√≠vel que chegou da enchente de maio, quando choveu mais de 500 mm em uma semana‚Äù, ressalta o Coordenador da Defesa Civil, Jonathan Siqueira. Em Canoas, o Escrit√≥rio de Resili√™ncia Clim√°tica e Defesa Civil informou que at√© a manh√£ deste domingo n√£o foram registrados transtornos decorrentes das chuvas que atingiram o munic√≠pio durante a madrugada. A precipita√ß√£o foi de 10,2 mil√≠metros, mas as equipes seguem em alerta diante da previs√£o de mais chuva para a regi√£o. No Vale do Ca√≠, o comportamento do rio tamb√©m √© de redu√ß√£o gradual. Na cidade de S√£o Sebasti√£o do Ca√≠, o Rio Ca√≠ aferiu nesta manh√£ a marca de 8,52m, bem longe da cota de inunda√ß√£o, que √© de 10,50m. De acordo com dados da Defesa Civil, ele baixou 86cm em 14 horas e segue em redu√ß√£o. Cerca de 300 pessoas seguem nos abrigos montados pela prefeitura. Na cidade de Montenegro, o Rio Ca√≠ est√° na marca dos 6,14m, baixando 2cm por hora e at√© o final da tarde ele deve sair de cota de inunda√ß√£o, que √© de 6m. Ainda h√° cerca de 20 pessoas nos abrigos.

author: wunderground.com
title: Central US Faces Severe Weather, Flood Threat Into Monday | Weather Underground
text:
Sign up for the Morning Brief email newsletter to get weekday updates from The Weather Channel and our meteorologists.
M&a;#8203;ultiple rounds of rain and thunderstorms will plague parts of the central U.S. into Monday, bringing threats of severe weather and flooding rain, even in areas where drought conditions exist.
H&a;#8203;ere&s;s the latest timing and impacts for the severe thunderstorm threat as well as where flooding may materialize:
Severe Weather Forecast Timing S&a;#8203;aturday-Saturday night: West Texas into southwest Oklahoma. Wind damage and hail are the primary threats, but an isolated tornado is possible, especially in southwest Texas.
S&a;#8203;unday-Sunday night: Areas from north Texas to western and central Oklahoma and central Kansas could see scattered severe storms. Wind damage and hail are the primary concerns, but an isolated tornado threat is possible.
M&a;#8203;onday-Monday Night: The threat will shift eastward from parts of Missouri southwestward to portions of Oklahoma, Arkansas and northern and eastern Texas. Wind damage, hail and a tornado threat may materialize depending on how unstable the atmosphere becomes.
F&a;#8203;lood Threat Forecast Timing A&a;#8203; broad area from far northern Texas into Oklahoma, western Arkansas, southeast Kansas and portions of Missouri may see 3 to 8 inches of rain into the new week ahead.
Even though this rain is needed given the widespread drought , too much rain too quickly could cause flash flooding. If traveling, be sure to never drive through any floodwaters.
H&a;#8203;ere&s;s a look at the timing of the greatest flood potential.
S&a;#8203;aturday-Saturday night: Texas Panhandle into much of Oklahoma, southeast Kansas and western Missouri.
S&a;#8203;unday-Sunday night : Far northern Texas to much of Oklahoma, northwest Arkansas, eastern Kansas, western and northern Missouri, southeast Iowa and western Illinois.
M&a;#8203;onday-Monday night: Northeast Texas to eastern Oklahoma, western and northern Arkansas, much of Missouri and western and northern Illinois.
W&a;#8203;hat&s;s Causing The Stormy Weather Pattern T&a;#8203;he main instigator is a sluggish low-pressure system tracking from the West into the central U.S. through early next week.
C&a;#8203;lockwise flow from high pressure in the East will pump plenty of Gulf of Mexico moisture northward for this system to interact with, giving rise to repeated rounds of rain and thunderstorms.
Chris Dolce has been a senior meteorologist with weather.com for over 10 years after beginning his career with The Weather Channel in the early 2000s.
\n
